description: With a progressive design that frees you to explore, the Sabre Pant handles every aspect of freeriding – from big mountain backcountry missions to a day carving up corduroy at the resort. The durable, breathable N80p-X 3L GORE-TEX shuts out sleet, snow, and wind. A flannel backer adds light insulation. Thigh vents dump heat on the uptrack, the focused articulation frees you to move on technical descents, and a RECCO® reflector’s embedded for added safety.
name: Arcteryx Sabre Pants, Short - Mens
